law.catch_line: In addition to any measures taken under § 5-1213 of this subtitle, in order to protect privately ow...
law.text:
In addition to any measures taken under § 5-1213 of this subtitle, in order to protect privately owned land adjoining or located in close proximity to a State wildland, each unit administering the designated wildland area shall:
Maintain fire access roads located within the wildland area in a passable condition as determined by the Department; and
Take or allow immediate action, as approved by the Department, to respond to any threat resulting from insects, disease, noxious weeds, or fire.
